DOC.brief_summary: This protocol is designed to study the effect and safety of 2 low-dose regimens of conjugated estrogen cream (PVC) given vaginally in postmenopausal women with atrophic vaginitis.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Conjugated Estrogen Cream for Atrophic Vaginitis
DOC.criteria: Generally healthy postmenopausal women with symptoms of atrophic vaginitis including vaginal dryness, vaginal itching, vaginal burning, and/or painful intercourse. The subject must have a clinical diagnosis of atrophic vaginitis and an intact uterus. Women who do not have a clinical diagnosis of atrophic vaginitis.
